title: African city: contrasting cultures
creator_credit: Frank Gardonyi, Clifford Janoff and Bailey Film Productions
brief_description: Discusses the great contrasts of culture, life style and economic well being in the African city of Abidjan on the Ivory Coast. Shows the two distinct areas which represent the dichotomy between the poor and the wealthy.
creator_credit_for_label: Frank Gardonyi, Clifford Janoff and Bailey Film Productions
